title: Material 3 Expressive for Compose: Loading Indicator
description: Alongside this years Google I/O announcements, Material 3 Expressive was released to offer a way for apps to become more individual and break out of the constraints that the original Material Design principles had created. With Material 3 expressive, our apps not only get the chance to stand out from one another, but also allow... Continue reading â†’
author: hitherejoe
